price: Owuo ahometeε bεba wͻ nokorε mu. Na woi ne adeε a na woredwane no no.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنۡهُ تَحِيدُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wajāat sakratu al-mawti bil-ḥaqi dhālika mā kunta min'hu taḥīdu
